name: Stranded Island
description:
Stranded Island is one of the best action adventure games of this year 2017. The best uncharted combination of forest games, underwater games and survival island games. This is one of the top rated games for survival escape, multiplayer survival hunt and island savage. Learn how to survive and become an island man who can survive in any extreme conditions in lash green forests online. You need to groom yourself in order to have enough skills to survive in lost isle.

Features:
- Explore the natural wilderness
- Freedom of both action and adventure together
- First-rate epic island survival story
- Don’t’ starve and collect food and store water for future days
- Amazing hunting experience in wild jungles
- Do anything to live on - Explore, Hunt, Eat and Conquer
